title: GAMING ТАСТАТУРА HYPERX ALLOY ORIGINS RED MECHANICAL GAMING KEYBOARD HX-KB6RDX-US
description:
Form factor: Full Size
Color: Black
Keyboard Type: Mechanical
Keyboard Layout: English (US)
Life Span (Keystrokes): 80 million
Keyboard Backlight: RGB (16,777,216 colors)
Keyboard Switch: HyperX Switch
Game Mode
Cable length: 1.8m
Actuation Point: 1.8mm
Anti-ghosting: 100% anti-ghosting
Light Effects: Per key RGB lighting and 5 brightness levels
Media Control
Rollover: N-key
Onboard Memory: 3 profiles
Compatibility: PC, PS5™, PS4™, Xbox Series X|S™, and Xbox One™. Software Compatibility: HyperX NGENUITY
Compatible operating systems: Windows® 10, 8.1, 8, 7
